basics.name: Joshua Wadsack-Myers
basics.label: Seeking opportunities
basics.summary: Received a B.S. in Computer Science in the Department of Information and Computer Sciences at the University of Hawaii at Manoa. Graduated Fall, 2017.

work.summary: Answer phone calls, Management of customer bookings and schedules, Co-manage and direct involvement with customer resolution, Manage and monitor multiple company platforms such as Facebook, Email, Live Chat, and Yelp, Direct coordination with owners, supervisors, and managers in a team oriented environment, Creation of new systems for management, Oversee fulfillment of online orders, Co-management of bookings at two company locations, Minor involvement with company website
highlights: Quickly promoted to Customer Service Specialist from Detailer soon after starting
Entrusted with management of booking and scheduling in multiple company locations

work.summary: File papers, answer phone calls, log data into databases
highlights: Reorganization of webpage for aesthetic purposes

volunteer.summary: Oversaw and managed development of a game as a class project at UH Manoa
highlights: Coordinated with ACM (Academy for Creative Media) major counterparts to develop a game

volunteer.summary: Acted as a disaster casualty for emergency personnel training purposes during RIMPAC
Volunteer work as a concession stand cashier and runner for food and drinks
Worked with Summer Fun leaders with preparation and coordination for events and other miscellaneous jobs
